General.Name: Gitennes Exploration Inc
General.Description: Gitennes Exploration Inc., a junior mineral exploration company, acquires and explores for mineral properties. The company primarily explores for gold, copper, and silver deposits. It holds interests in the New Mosher, Maxwell, and JMW gold properties in northern Quebec; the Snowbird gold property in northern British Columbia; and three gold/copper properties in the Gaspé region of Quebec, Canada, as well as a royalty interest in the Urumalqui silver property in Peru. The company is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 325 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1Z7
